ViewObject.Name: SrvJobCardLogCIC_0051QVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT Jobcardno, DocId, DocType, doctypeId, TO_DATE(DOC_DATE,'DD-MON-RRRR HH24:MI:SS') DOC_DATE, cr_date, Doc_Desc, reverse_chk FROM (select m.jobcardno, null reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'JobCard' DocType, 'JOBCARD' DocTypeId, m.jobcardno DocId, m.jobdate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JOBCARD m where m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select d.jobcardno,d.reverse_chk, nvl(d.modified_date,d.created_date) cr_date, 'CRO Handover' DocType, 'JHO' DocTypeId, m.jhoid DocId, m.hodate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JobHandOverToLab m, SRV_JHOTLDetl d where m.jhoid = d.jhoid and m.posted = 'Y' and d.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select d.jobcardno,d.reverse_chk, nvl(d.modified_date,d.created_date) cr_date, 'Assign' DocType, 'JOBASSIGN' DocTypeId, m.assignid DocId, m.assdate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, m.technicianid||', '||t.techician||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JobAssign m, SRV_JobAssDetl d, SRV_TECHNICIAN t where m.assignid = d.assignid and t.TECHNICIANID = m.TECHNICIANID and m.posted = 'Y' and d.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Replacement' DocType, 'RP' DocTypeId, m.SR_Id DocId, m.SR_Date||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, 'Replacement: '||i.model_no||' '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_Set_Replacement m, In_Items i where m.posted = 'Y' and m.itemid=i.itemid and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,null reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Reversal' DocType, 'SRREV' DocTypeId, m.Reversal_Id DocId, m.Rev_Date||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, Decode(DocType,'JHO','CRO Handover', 'JOBASSIGN','Assign', 'RP','Replacement', 'RJW','Review Warranty', 'JOBEST','Estimation', 'ISSUE','Parts Issuance', 'ISSUE_RET','Parts Return', 'JOBSOLUTION','Job Solution', 'JOBQC','Job QC', 'JQCBD','QC Before Deliver', 'SETDELI','Set Delivery', 'COURIERDELI','Courier Delivery', 'JTrans','Job Transfer', 'DPTrans','Pending Transfer', 'JRet','Job Return', 'DPJRet','Pending Return', 'Log','Logistic', 'DPLog','Pending Receive', 'INV','Invoice', 'JOBSWAP','Job Swap')||' reverse by: '||m.createdby Doc_Desc from SRV_Reversal m where m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Review Warranty' DocType, 'RJW' DocTypeId, m.reviewid DocId, m.rv_date||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, decode(m.warranty,'IW','Warranty','NW','Non Warranty','OW','Optional Warranty')||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_REVIEWJOBWARRANTY m where m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Estimation' DocType, 'JOBEST' DocTypeId, m.est_id DocId, to_char(m.Posted_Date,'DD-MON-YY hh:mi') Doc_Date, 'Revised Est. part cost '||APCOST||' is '||decode(APPROVED,'Yes','Approved','No','Not Approved') ||', '||nvl(d.Remarks,m.remarks)||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JOBESTIMATION m, (select * from SRV_ESTDETL d where d.call_date = (select max(call_date) from SRV_ESTDETL where est_id=d.est_id)) d where m.posted = 'Y' and m.est_id=d.est_id(+) and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Parts Issuance' DocType, 'ISSUE' DocTypeId, m.issue_id DocId, m.issuedate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, t.techician||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_ISSUANCE m, SRV_TECHNICIAN t where t.TECHNICIANID = m.TECHNICIANID and m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select i.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Parts Return' DocType, 'ISSUE_RET' DocTypeId, m.IssueRetId DocId, m.RetDate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, t.techician||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_ISSUERETURN m, SRV_ISSUANCE i, SRV_TECHNICIAN t where m.issue_id = i.issue_id and t.TECHNICIANID = m.TECHNICIANID and m.posted = 'Y' and i.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Job Solution' DocType, 'JOBSOLUTION' DocTypeId, m.jsolution_id DocId, m.js_date||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, 'Level:'||m.levelno||', '||m.jsstatus||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JOBSOLUTION m where m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, decode(m.doctypeid,'JQC','Job QC','QCBD','QC Before Deliver') DocType, decode(m.doctypeid,'JQC','JOBQC','QCBD','JQCBD') DocTypeId, m.qcdocid DocId, m.qcdate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, decode(m.status,'Y','Pass','N','Fail')||', '||c.Description||', '||t.techician||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JOBQC m, SRV_QC c, SRV_TECHNICIAN t where m.posted = 'Y' and m.QCId = c.QCId and m.qcpersonid = t.TECHNICIANID and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Set Delivery' DocType, 'SETDELI' DocTypeId, m.setdeliid DocId, m.sddate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, m.remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_SETDELIVERY m where m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select d.jobcardno,d.reverse_chk, nvl(d.modified_date,d.created_date) cr_date, 'Courier Deli' DocType, 'COURIERDELI' DocTypeId, m.CDID DocId, m.CDdate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_CourierDeli m, SRV_CDDetail d where m.CDID = d.CDID and m.posted = 'Y' and d.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select d.jobcardno,d.reverse_chk, nvl(d.modified_date,d.created_date) cr_date, 'Jobs Inventory' DocType, m.doctype DocTypeId, m.jinv_id DocId, m.jinv_date||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, m.remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from srv_jobsinventory m, srv_jobsinv_detl d where m.jinv_id = d.jinv_id and m.posted = 'Y' and d.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'DAP Approval' DocType, 'DAP' DocTypeId, m.dap_id DocId, m.dap_date||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, 'Approved '||m.bh_approval||' '||m.bh_remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from srv_dap m where m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select d.jobcardno,d.reverse_chk, nvl(d.modified_date,d.created_date) cr_date, decode(m.Doctype,'JTrans','Job Transfer','DPTrans','Pending Transfer') DocType, m.DocType DocTypeId, m.transferid DocId, m.tdate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, 'Location: '||m.tolocationid||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JOBTRANSFER m, SRV_JOBTRANSFERDETL d where m.transferid = d.transferid and m.posted = 'Y' and d.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select d.jobcardno,d.reverse_chk, nvl(d.modified_date,d.created_date) cr_date, decode(m.Doctype,'JRet','Job Return','DPJRet','Pending Return') DocType, m.DocType DocTypeId, m.jobretid DocId, m.jrdate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, 'Location: '||m.tolocationid||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JOBRETURN m, SRV_JOBRETDETL d where m.jobretid = d.jobretid and m.posted = 'Y' and d.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select d.jobcardno,d.reverse_chk, nvl(d.modified_date,d.created_date) cr_date, decode(m.Doctype,'Log','Logistic','DPLog','Pending Receive') DocType, m.DocType DocTypeId, m.logid DocId, m.logdate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, 'from Location: '||m.fromlocationid||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_LOGISTIC m, SRV_LOGDETL d where m.logid = d.logid and m.posted = 'Y' and d.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Invoice' DocType, 'INV' DocTypeId, m.srv_invno DocId, m.inv_date||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, 'Received: '||m.Received||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_INVOICE m where m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO
UNION ALL select m.jobcardno,m.reverse_chk, nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date) cr_date, 'Job Swap' DocType, 'JOBSWAP' DocTypeId, m.swapid DocId, m.sdate||to_char(nvl(m.modified_date,m.created_date),' hh:mi') Doc_Date, m.swp_status||', '||m.Remarks||', submit by: '||m.modifiedby Doc_Desc from SRV_JOBSWAP m where m.posted = 'Y' and m.jobcardno = :P_ADF_JOBCARDNO) Order by cr_date

ViewAttribute.Name: txtDays
